name: Hemanth Kumar

services.title: Web Design UI
services.description: I provide service to create user-friendly, visually appealing digital interfaces through user research, wireframing, prototyping, and iterative design.

services.title: Web Application Development
services.description: I build interactive web applications with advanced functionality, using React for the front end and Node.js, Express.js for the back end.

services.title: API Development
services.description: As a Full-stack developer I can build RESTful APIs to enable communication between front-end and back-end systems.

services.title: Maintenance and Updates
services.description: I provide ongoing maintenance, bug fixes, and updates to ensure the smooth operation of websites and applications.

aboutpara: I'm a computer science undergraduate with a strong passion for technology. Currently, I'm actively working on MERN stack projects, focusing on MongoDB, Express.js, React, and Node.js. Simultaneously, I'm dedicated to mastering Data Structures and Algorithms (DSA) to build a solid foundation for efficient software development.
